earn.title: Earn
earn.description: Save and earn interest automatically with your $CLPa. Plus get direct access to international digital and real-world asset markets to further grow your investment.

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.description: The first Chilean stablecoin fully backed by Chilean Pesos. Deposit Chilean Pesos from your bank account, get $CLPa and unlock the best of digital money.

withdraw.title: Withdraw
withdraw.description: Each $CLPa is backed 100% by Chilean Pesos in a secure bank account. You can change them for pesos in your bank account 24 hours a day, without delay.

features.title: The future of digital money, now
features.description1: $CLPa is the first and only Chilean peso stablecoin with guaranteed reserve audits and verifiable reserves. There will always be 1 CLP in reserves for every $CLPa in circulation.
features.description2: Using $CLPa, you get instant, national and international transfers, secure and low-cost. Plus, it's programmable through smart contracts, opening infinite possibilities for its use and distribution.

q1-1.title: Integrations
q1-1.description: with wallets, exchanges and DeFi applications to facilitate the use of the stablecoin in the onchain ecosystem.

q1-2.title: Local Businesses
q1-2.description: Enable payments with $CLPa in local business points of sale.

q1-3.title: E-commerce Integration Kit
q1-3.description: Start receiving payments in your e-commerce with $CLPa and earn immediate interest rewards.

q2-1.title: Commercial Alliances
q2-1.description: Alliances with companies that accept stablecoin payments and local fintechs.

q2-2.title: APIs For Merchants and Developers
q2-2.description: Infrastructure and documentation for institutional use, in stores and applications of the stablecoin.

q3-1.title: International Expansion
q3-1.description: Opening markets where the demand for a Chilean peso stablecoin can grow (for example, for remittances).

q3-2.title: Protocol Optimization
q3-2.description: Continuous improvements based on market feedback and regular security audits.

q3-3.title: Decentralized Governance
q3-3.description: Adoption of decentralized governance systems for the evolution of the stablecoin and compliance with regulations as they are updated.

q4-1.title: Adoption Programs and Liquidity
q4-1.description: Incentives for users to adopt the stablecoin, such as staking, rewards, or liquidity promotions on decentralized exchanges.
